context.flawed_solution:
#### 175
The tailor bought 90 + 10 = <<90+10=100>>100 yellow buttons.
He also bought 90 - 5 = <<90-5=85>>85 blue buttons.
Therefore, The tailor purchased 90 + 85 = <<90+85=175>>175 buttons.
